title: Bug 37021: Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021: Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/ for code to reproduce the issue. Limitations: False positives occur in harness verification of messages due to disabled filename checking. AJDT may omit the filename if it doesn't make sense to AJDT.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars is displayed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be listed in the form 'app/Main'.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Run the code provided in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.
2. Check the declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars.
